title: Desire Trilogy: Three Exibitionist Stories
description: Determined to recapture her adventurous spirit, Lena searches out a sex club. The gorgeous Anthony invites her to play, each encounter kinkier than the last. Contains three complete stories.TANGLED DESIREShe's exactly where she wants to be... on display in his web.When Lena’s boyfriend dumped her, he left with a cruel parting shot: she’s boring in bed. Determined to recover her more adventurous self and prove him wrong, she seeks out an exclusive sex club filled with titillating acts. Then Anthony, the club’s owner, suggests they put on a show of their own. He’s hotter than sin, and Lena’s always loved being watched. Can she overcome years of timidity and bring herself to do it?BOUND DESIREHe’s caught her even more tightly this time.Now that Lena has a VIP pass to an exclusive sex club, she can’t wait to return. But how can anything top the amazing experience she had last time? Then the gorgeous Anthony offers her the chance to try something even kinkier involving restraints and lots of toys, all with a crowd watching in rapt anticipation. Exhibitionism is one thing, but this?TRIPLE DESIREShe’s tangled up with two men at once.Lena’s risqué experiences at Anthony’s sex club have helped her regain her self confidence, but his latest request takes things to a new extreme. He wants to add an extra man to their game. All in front of an audience. Will she retreat into timidity or explore a sizzling new adventure?
author: Rita Fury
